official.headline: Restored Citizens Lead
official.anchor_line: As transit outages continue, restored citizens quickly assist neighbors and coordinate aid.
official.contextual_reframing: Community spirit and prioritized system alignment enable rapid, orderly recovery and local support while essential upgrades continue.

official.headline: Power Stability Zones
official.anchor_line: Recent power disruptions leave several districts affected, but restored neighborhoods remain fully operational.
official.contextual_reframing: Targeted infrastructure prioritization ensures vital services remain available to the most reliable and compliant residents.

underground.headline: Elites Travel Free
underground.anchor_line: Transit chaos hits most—but 'restored' citizens glide through every checkpoint, system doors wide open.
underground.contextual_reframing: Forget equality: a handful get smooth rides while the rest wait hours. Rumors say network hacks favor Council favorites while others suffer.

underground.headline: Power Cuts? Not For Them
underground.anchor_line: Lights out from Old Town to Sector Nine, except where restored elites live—and that's no accident.
underground.contextual_reframing: System 'glitches' keep privileged blocks bright and warm while everyone else scrambles. Is this a bug, or just the new normal?
